TEXT.TITLE: NETWORK SECURITY <NTWK.O> HOLDERS TO SELL STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Network Security Corp said three of its major shareholders have executed definitive agreements to sell their shares to Inspectorate International <INSZ.Z> SA. The company said its previously-announced merger into Inspectorate is still subject to approval by Network shareholders. Reuter
